description: Best whatsapp for linux. Supports themes, uses your OS window decorations (important for my OCD matching applications), please donate to support these open source developers. Remember - we aren't looking for FREE solutions, because that business model doesn't work in life. We are looking to find the BEST solutions, and support them to get what we really want
Whatsapp on Arch Linux
Work great didnt't fail so far, all in all - great!
Cannot use keyboard shortcuts because the Alt key is bound to display application settings of ZapZap, making all the whatsapp shortcuts bound to with Alt key unusable
summary: calling not present, cannot use keyboard shortcuts

description: It's just a webapp doing exactly the same as the web browser. It's safer if you just use your web browser instead of a dedicated webapp that does whoever knows...
Says to update chrome
Probably the best Whatsapp client for linux.

The main reason i use it is for having multiple account running at once and it does that perfectly! 

kudos for the devs
just took me to the browser to log in, so I will just use the browser, uninstalling
Great client, it works without problems.

The drag and drop is a really nice feature.
The multiple accounts feature is also really nice!

5/5

Tested this a bit and seems works great.
Has settings to disable the zapzap theme, so the desktop theme is respected. Support pasting of the clipboard and has some other nice to have features.
Works fine, but doesn't integrate with kde. The menu and toolbar icon doesn't load properly in Steam OS.

OK so far. I've tried every single WA client for Linux and this so far is the less buggy. 
But it has its own bugs LoL.. there is definitely some problem with event handling for mouse clicks: when I click on the titlebar or the menus the click is held instead of released. 
Also, I'd like an option for native notifications on KDE
This project is amazing, i love it
Its probably possible to use it but its browser version is so old you cant get half of the features but setting menu was great
the cursor into the program is bigger than the gnome's cursor, for me is better if the program has the same cursor like gnome's cursor
every 5 seconds it will freeze and you can't click on anything, pressing Escape opens the 3 dots menu

im on fedora 38 gnome classic and suddenly the app stopped working after first restarting my computer. Ive tried uninstalling and installing again, but it doesnt seem to work. Whist I was using it I had a great time, def better than the web whatsapp. I hope I can fix it soon. Giving 4/5 because of this technical problem, otherwise it wouldve been a solid 5/5

Every other app I tried had issues with either images, audios, sending files, etc.
This one doesn't seem to have any issues and I've tested everything that has gone wrong on the other ones.
summary: Only Whatsapp desktop that worked flawlessly

description: The app does not launch. KDE Garuda (Arch)
If there's a custom notification sound for ZapZap, it would be better because a unique sound makes it easier for us to recognize that it's from ZapZap.

The app is great, but it recently started to use a lot of CPU. I have an Intel i7-10700 8c/16t and it is contantly using 8-12% of the CPU (almost an entire core just for the app, all the time).

Edit: The problem was solved after I removed the "$HOME/.var/app/com.rtosta.zapzap/" folder and restarted the app (and configured it again).
user_display: Igor Alexandre Dutra e Silva - JFRS

description: This is one fast, smooth and behaves itself nicely!

I have not seen a feature not working as intended, and it has gotten extra features with the last update. I recommend using it instead of other Whatsapp clients because every client aside from this one has features that don't work properly like scaling the app (to more or less than 100% scale) or recording audios, etc.

It Works Great And That's The Sad Part, It Works So Great But Unfortunately The New Update Changed How It Looked. And Now It Doesn't Go With Any Of Gnome Applications. It Looks Odd One Out. The Title Bar, Borders, Etc, Everything
summary: New Update Doesn't Follow Gnome Theme

description: It was my favorite Whatsapp desktop alternative. However, since the two most recent updates, it crashes when starting up. I seems to have got back an old incompatible issue with NVIDIA boards.
Never had any issues. Feels completely native on KDE or GNOME DEs, with notifications, sounds and updates all smoothly operating. Excellent work!
Best for my machine (KDE + Debian Trixie)
Very good, a lot of funcionalities.

for me my main gripe is that the spell check seems to think any word over about 5 characters is misspelled, which for a dislexic fuzz like myself is a bit of an issue, but hey ho, it'll help me practice! haha
Hasta ahora funciona muy bien, es estable y da lo que promete
Hasta ahora, es la mejor aplicación para ejecutar WA en Linux.
Me pide que instale chrome para poder funcionar, me imagino porque como esta app esta hecha sobre Edge, esta altamente relacionado a eso.
Hasta el momento la mejor opcion que he probado para whatsapp en flatpak, y he probado todas. Se han incluido muchisimas mejoras en el ultimo tiempo.
Funciona muy bien, las alertas son iguales a las empleadas por la aplicación web, no ralentiza el pc, consume pocos recurso y además permite cierta personalización. Recomendada
Funciona genial, aunque tiene algunos problemas para reproducir videos, que a veces salen como una reproducción espasmódica, dando saltos repetidos todo el video, aunque el audio sale bien.

La aplicación va muy bien, me gusta la idea de tener multi cuentas, así tengo la personal y la del trabajo.

Pero el bug más raro que tiene es que no puedo pegar texto 😂️, no puedo conbinarla con la extension Pano de GNOME, solo puedo pegar imágenes, pero no me deja pegar textos preseleccionados... 😵‍💫️
summary: Buena, pero con un bug raro

description: Ahora no finciona, necesita un Chrome superior
There are some glitches, but the author is very committd to development, and I personally can attest that he is diligent in solving issues! Way to go

summary: В целом очень доволен работой данного приложения

description: Масштабируется.
При сохранении файла, файловый менеджер не сохраняет имя файла - приходится писать вручную. Если использовать веб-версию через браузер, то все имена сохраняются.

До крайнего обновления приложение периодически зависало. Помогал только ресет ПК. В крайнем обновлении вне зависимости от темы в системе и темы в настройках самого приложения рамка остается белой, а внутрянка приложения темная либо белая (в зависимости от настроек). смотрится ужасно.
